issue.title: Define competition phases and dates for 2019

content.raw:
Another idea could be to offer some “certification” to each team that reaches a certain scoring threshold in each event. The difficulty of the three events increases this year. Each event “requires” a certain “certification” to participate. E.g.:

* \[**Shrimp**\] event

    * When: September
    * Minimum requirement: None
    * Grants “Jet propulsion” to qualified teams
    
* \[**Jellyfish**\] event

    * When? November
    * Minimum requirement? Jet propulsion
    * Grants: “Fish” to qualified teams
    
* \[**Angelfish**\] event

    * When? December
    * Minimum? Fish
    * Grants: None
    

It could be fun :slight_smile: And we could even do stickers with the certifications \(Jet propulsion or Fish\). The name of the events could also change and be a fun part.
